about_the_game:
Welcome to the Land of Fateful Threads, Carmera...

You have been summoned to the Sky Town of another world, where dark meteors rain from the heavens, spreading chaos and corruption.

Monster Girl Saga: Fallen Heroes is an open-world action RPG where you face off against fallen heroes, once allies of the monster girls, now consumed by distorted love and the power of the Dark Runestone. Your mission is to rescue the monster girls, rebuild your village, and save the world from impending doom.

Thrilling Combat Against Fallen Heroes

The fallen heroes, former allies of the monster girls, are beings tainted by the power of the Dark Runestone. Overcome their formidable abilities and rescue the monster girls.
Recruited monster girls can join your party, allowing you to switch between characters mid-battle to utilize diverse skills and combat styles.

A Vibrant Open World

Immerse yourself in a dynamic world where the passage of time and real-time weather changes shape your journey. Explore diverse landscapes, from sunlit forests to stormy ruins, each offering fresh challenges, secrets, and rewards.

Diverse Job System

Rebuild a thriving village by assigning rescued monster girls to various jobs, such as farmers, blacksmiths, and alchemists.

  • Farmers cultivate crops to sustain the village.

  • Blacksmiths mine and forge materials for equipment.

  • Alchemists create potions to aid in your quest.

Each job contributes to restoring life and prosperity to the once-ruined land.

Interactive Relationships with Monster Girls

Build bonds with the monster girls you save. Overwork them, and they may become tired or refuse to work.Cheer them up through rock-paper-scissors, heartfelt interactions, or even a simple hug. Your care and attention can reignite their spirits and strengthen your team.

The Unique Charm of Indie Solo Development

Crafted with passion by a solo indie developer, this game offers a deeply personal experience. From its richly detailed world to its innovative mechanics and emotionally compelling story,
